body.p: Do females or males have a higher median SSHA score?

response.feedback: Correct. The median SSHA score of females is higher than the median score for males (153 vs. 114).
Incorrect. Note that the median SSHA score of females is higher than the median score for males (153 vs. 114).

part.hint: Look at both the side-by-side boxplot and the five-number summary to determine if females or males have a higher median SSHA.

body.p: Do females or males have higher variability in SSHA scores?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Note that males' scores display more variability both in terms of IQR (49.5 vs. 35) and in terms of the full range of scores (117 vs. 97).
Correct. Males' scores display more variability both in terms of IQR (49.5 vs. 35) and in terms of the full range of scores (117 vs. 97).

part.hint: Look at both the side-by-side boxplot and the five-number summary to determine if females or males have a higher variability in SSHA scores.
